name: The Miso Marvel Ramen
description: A rich miso broth combined with tofu, bok choy, enoki mushrooms, bean sprouts, sesame seeds, and a perfectly seasoned egg. Served with thin noodles. (Vegan option available)

name: The Spicy Tonkotsu Explosion Ramen
description: An explosive blend of spicy tonkotsu broth, pork belly, bamboo shoots, wood ear mushrooms, scallions, nori, and a fiery seasoned egg. Choose your spice level: Mild, Medium, or Inferno.

name: The Seafood Symphony Ramen
description: A harmonious mix of seafood broth, shrimp, scallops, squid, mussels, napa cabbage, nori strips, and a zesty seasoned egg. Served with a medley of noodles.

name: Crispy Gyoza Delight
description: Golden-brown pan-fried gyoza filled with a succulent blend of pork, cabbage, and aromatic spices. Served with a tangy soy dipping sauce.

name: Edamame Euphoria
description: Steamed young soybeans sprinkled with sea salt, creating a simple yet delightful appetizer. Perfect for sharing and snacking.
